title: Column icons don't show up when connecting to a Derby database
description: When attempting to connect to a Derby database in a new project and creating a dataset, the column icons are not displaying as expected.
OB: When attempting to connect to a Derby database in a new project and creating a dataset, the column icons are not displayed in the Edit Data Set window.
EB: Column icons should be visible in the Edit Data Set window when connecting to a Derby database. These icons are expected to provide visual cues and functionalities for managing dataset columns.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new project.
2. Create a new report within the project.
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a Derby database using the following parameters:
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui
   - User Name: root
   - Password: root
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset within the report.
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select 'Query' as the data source type and proceed.
